page.title: 17A Day at school
page.content: My name is Nicola Cumberbeach and I attend Salesian School, Chertsey.I am 13 years old and am in the 2nd year. I travel to school by train. Today is Tuesday so we have assembly, and I have Drama. Following this is Geography, then Art, with break in between. Then it is lunchtime for one hour. After this is French then English, which I enjoy. I think I would like to be a journalist when I leave school. After break is science then Religion. As I have to travel home by train I do not arrive until 5.00 pm.
